channel.title: General on The cloud architect's playbook
channel.description: Recent content in General on The cloud architect's playbook

item.title: Experiments with Chat GPT
item.description: Chat GPT is currently the talk of the town, so of course I did a few experiments with it. This time I tried to have the AI solve a maths puzzle, here’s what came out: Anmerkung: I have left out the AI courtesy phrases to keep the text more readable. My Request ChatGPTs Response Comment Imagine a 4 digit number that multiplied by 4 gives you the same number written backwards One possible solution is the number 2002.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Every beginning is hard … So here I am with my own blog project. It came to me after I saw a video on YouTube about HUGO static websites and found it an exciting challenge. The video was several months ago, but who has time to take care of the project then? In the end, it was the Christmas holidays of 2022 that gave me the time I needed to take care of the blog.
